message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $95. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $87.50?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?
